1.title: Under My Minsk

episode of.title: Keeping Up with the Greensteens (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Meet the crazy, Eco-friendly couple, Abner and Mindy Greensteen; and watch them struggle to save the world, and not kill their neighbor - non-recycler, and spoiler of the earth, Drake Minsk.

2.title: Eco-Therapy

episode of.title: Keeping Up with the Greensteens (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Putting themselves in the hands of their therapist, the Greensteens seek a remedy for the forces that are tearing them apart.

3.title: Spring Cleaning

episode of.title: Keeping Up with the Greensteens (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Washing off the scent of a Minsk isn't as easy as it sounds. Mindy and Abner wrestle to tidy up after a close call with the 'Big Man' upstairs.

4.title: The Arrest

episode of.title: Keeping Up with the Greensteens (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Swallowed by the blue wall of silence, Abner fights for life and limb. Stricken with grief, Mindy seeks comfort in the arms of Drake Minsk.

5.title: Where in the World Is Abner Greensteen

episode of.title: Keeping Up with the Greensteens (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Living with regrets is something Mindy said she would never do. But hey, into the Minsk goes Mindy.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Buy a hybrid, wear hemp clothing, sell your big house, recycle, turn off the damn lights. 'Cause if you don't, there's not a chance in hell of Keeping up with the Greensteens. Watch Mindy and Abner spiral into the unknown as they strive to save the planet.
